name: Black Swirl Buttons
description:
Each button measures approximately 20mm in diameter. Each button is made from super fine, super white Australian porcelain which has been hand polished to make it deliciously tactile and smooth. The buttons have a matte finish, as they are unglazed, just polished.

The black spiral design is applied using a japanese tissue transfer technique before the buttons are fired.

I machine wash my buttons on the garments they are attached to, on a wool cycle, and though I havent had any problems, I do still feel a little nervous each time. If you were to gently machine wash the buttons in a washing bag, or even inside out you should have no problems.

Please let me know if you have any special preferences or requirements in selecting your set of buttons, as each button is slightly different. If you need something specific for your project, let me know so I can do my best to accommodate it.

name: NEW 20mm and 13mm Plain Porcelain Buttons
description:
These buttons are available in 2 sizes. The larger ones are 20mm  and the smaller ones are 13mm.

Each button is made from super fine, super white Australian porcelain which has been hand polished to make it deliciously tactile and smooth. The buttons have a matte finish, as they are unglazed, just polished. 

These are plain porcelain buttons, without texture or other embellishment. Perfect for projects requiring a minimalist approach. 

I machine wash my buttons on the garments they are attached to, on a wool cycle, and though I havent had any problems, I do still feel a little nervous each time. If you were to gently machine wash the buttons in a washing bag, or even inside out you should have no problems. 

Please let me know if you have any special preferences or requirements in selecting your set of buttons, as each button is slightly different. If you need something specific for your project, let me know so I can do my best to accommodate it.
